column1: 711514,Plastics Production Machine Operator (General),,"Operate plastic or rubber forming equipment
column3: Compare physical characteristics of materials or products to specifications or standards
column7: Test chemical or physical characteristics of materials or products
column11: Monitor equipment operation to ensure no flaws
column19: Operate extruding machines to produce rods or encase materials in plastic or rubber
column21: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column23: Safely handle chemicals for work applications
column25: Place materials into or onto moulds
column27: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column29: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column33: Troubleshoot equipment or systems operation problems
column35: Prepare moulds or casts for production
column37: Review blueprints or other instructions to determine operational methods or sequences
column41: Mix substances to create chemical solutions
column43: Trim excess material from work pieces
